prontera,164,196,4	script	PvP Master	483,{
cutin "3rd_sura_master.bmp",2;
mes "[^1E90FFPvP Master^000000]";
mes "Escolha qual PvP você quer!";
mes "^FF3355PvP Origem^000000 não e permitido itens custom!";
mes "^FF3355PvP Extreme^000000 não e permitido itens de cura";
switch(select("^FF3355PvP Origem^000000[^1E90FF"+getmapusers ("pvp_n_5-5")+"^000000/^FF335550^000000]:^FF3355PvP Extreme^000000[^1E90FF"+getmapusers ("pvp_n_3-5")+"^000000/^FF335550^000000]:^1E90FFLoja Master^000000:^FF3355Não Obrigado^000000")){
	case 1:
	next;
	mes "[^1E90FFPvP Origem^000000]";
	mes "Ok vou te levar até lá";
	close2;
	warp "pvp_n_5-5", 0, 0;
	cutin "",255;
	end;
	
	case 2:
	next;
	mes "[^1E90FFPvP Extreme^000000]";
	mes "Ok vou te levar até lá";
	close2;
	warp "pvp_n_3-5", 0, 0;
	cutin "",255;
	end;

	case 3:		
	next;		
	mes "[^1E90FFPvP Extreme^000000]";
	mes "Não disponivel no momento =)";
	close2;		
	cutin "",255;		
	end;

	case 4:
	next;
	mes "[^1E90FFPvP Masteer^000000]";
	mes "Ok volte sempre";
	close2;
	cutin "",255;
	end;
	}
OnInit:
	waitingroom "",0;
OnTimer1000:
	setarray .@RoomDisplay$,"[PvP Sem Custom]","[PvP Sem Cura]";
	delwaitingroom;
	waitingroom .@RoomDisplay$[rand(0,1)],0;
	initnpctimer;

}

pvp_n_5-5	mapflag	noitem	21000,21001,21002,21003,21004,21005,21006,21007,21008,21010,21011,21013,21014,21016,21017,21018,21019,21020,21021,21022,21023,21024,21033,21034,21035,21036,21037,21038,21039,21040,21041,21042,21043,21044,21045,21046,21047,21048,21050,21051,21052,21053,21054,21055,21056,21057,21058,21059,21060,21061,21062,21063,21064,21065,21066,21067,21069,21070,21073,21074,21075,21076,21077,21078,21079,21080,21081,21082,21083,21084,21085,21086,21087,21088,21090,21091,21100,21101,21102,21104,21105,21106,21107,21108,21109,21110,21111,21112,21114,21115,21116,21117,21118,21119,21120,21121,21124,21125,21126,21127,21128,21129,21130,21131,21132,21133,21134,21135,21136,21137,21138,21141,21143,21144,21145,21146,21147,21148,21149,21150,21151,21152,21153,21154,21155,21156,21157,21158,21159,21160,21161,21162,21163,21164,21165,21166,21167,21168,21171,21452,21453,21454,21455,21456,21429,21431,21435,21436,21437,21439,21440,21441,21449,21176,21177,21178,21179,21180,21181,21182,21183,21184,21185,21186,21400,21401,21402,21403,21404,21405,21406,21407,21410,21411,21413,21415,21448,21300,21310,21311,21312,21313,21314,21315,21316,21317,21318,21319,21321,21323,21326,21329,21330,21331,21332,21334,21447,21408

pvp_n_3-5	mapflag	noitem	607,608,501,502,503,504,505,507,508,509,510,512,513,514,515,516,517,518,519,520,521,522,526,528,529,530,531,532,533,534,535,536,537,538,539,540,541,544,545,546,547,548,549,550,551,552,553,554,555,556,557,558,559,560,561,562,563,564,565,566,567,568,569,570
